item.description:
What better way to celebrate GOOD FRIDAY afternoon???!!!
Show your support for AUTISM AWARENESS by wearing blue jeans, T shirt, bandana, hat, scarf and jacket. It is optional to register for this event by clicking here
Enjoy a draft beer outdoors in the Beer Garden. Hopefully it will be a nice sunny afternoon as we are the first group to celebrate the spring grand reopening. It gets cold after sunset so plan on bringing your cold weather gear. We will huddled be in the cozy corner of the bar closest to the fire pit.

I have to work that afternoon ..so I can get there hopefully right at 4pm.
If it is a nice sunny day, expect that it will be crowded and fill up fast. Please, if you can, indicate in your rsvp comment.. if you can arrive EARLIER!!...PLEASE GRAB THE CORNER BAR STOOLS CLOSEST TO THE FIRE PIT


The Beer Garden at Charlieâ€™s Kitchen Opens



This country was built on simple, virtuous truths:Freedom, Equality,

And the right to drink al fresco!

EVERYONE MUST MAINTAIN THEIR OWN TAB!!!






Details to follow soon.
Lauren
item.how_to_find_us: Lauren will be wearing a blue wind breaker jacket
item.name: BEER GARDEN @ CHARLIE'S KITCHEN
